description: Numerous lightning strikes, which lasted all of Thursday night, lit up the island's sky.
title: 'Spectacular' lightning storm lights up Isle of Man sky
title_page: 'Spectacular' lightning storm lights up Isle of Man sky - BBC News
maintext: Stephen Marsh, who watched the storm from his home in Fleshwick, said it was "very quiet to start with" before "the clouds got dark and then it was right above us".
